module.name: Fax Configuration
module.description: Adds configurations, options and GUI for inbound faxing
module.changelog: *13.0.29* FREEPBX-11642 Reorganize dialplan *13.0.28* FREEPBX-11901 Sort by extension *13.0.27* Current code uses ivr_list. Should use ivr_get_details instead *13.0.26* Better migration techiques *13.0.25* Use '/usr/bin/env php' to find PHP *13.0.24* FREEPBX-10962 fax support in bulk handler *13.0.23* FREEPBX-10932 *13.0.22* FREEPBX-10482 Cycle out of sql errors if there are any *13.0.21* FREEPBX-10427, FREEPBX-10414, multiple fax issues resolved *13.0.20* Fix fax permissions *13.0.19* FREEPBX-10410 fax tab missing when creating user *13.0.18* FREEPBX-10412 error on extension create and delete *13.0.17* Standardize all fax formats and sizes *13.0.16* Get correct values when updating or adding users *13.0.15* Tif not tiff in selection *13.0.14* Add critical notice if an upgrade happened *13.0.13* Move to full support of User Manager *13.0.12* Cleanup erroneous data *13.0.11* FREEPBX-10381 update inbound fax to actually work *13.0.10* Fix permission management in User Manager *13.0.9* Remove quick create options for fax *13.0.8* Specify a more exact version of User Manager *13.0.7* FREEPBX-9953 Add Userman requirement *13.0.6* Add warning for invalid baud rates *13.0.5* Add support for userman bulkhandler hooks *13.0.4* FREEPBX-9577 Drop res_fax_digium support for Asterisk 13 *13.0.3* FREEPBX-9541 Inbound Route Not Retaining Fax Settings *13.0.2* Version bump Beta *13.0.1alpha7* Move did hook to BMO *13.0.1alpha6* Quick create styling fixes *13.0.1alpha5* Group support in Userman *13.0.1alpha4* Follow database scheme *13.0.1alpha3* FREEPBX-8638 Delete PDF and TIFF when requested *13.0.1alpha2* FREEPBX-7177 Check for remote station id, fix incoming settings *13.0.1alpha1* Bump for layout *12.0.5* Redo module_hook calls to use static obj *12.0.4* Tweaks to max res and widths *12.0.3* FREEPBX-7140 Set page max resolution and widths so that all pages are the same sizes *12.0.2* Dont Copy duplicate functions *12.0.1* BMO Module *2.11.0.9* Update license file *2.11.0.8* Fix issues with older Asterisk versions caused by fixing #5816 *2.11.0.7* #5816, Adds ru_RU and ja_JP languages *2.11.0.6* Allow specifying email attachment type(s) on inbound fax. *2.11.0.5* Add support for sending email on outbound fax. *2.11.0.4* #6985 Dont display fax options if they wont work *2.11.0.3* #6917 *2.11.0.2* #6810 *2.11.0.1* #6647, #6556 *2.11.0.0* bump version *2.10.0.6* re #5906 - workaround for php < 5.2 *2.10.0.5* minor code cleanup *2.10.0.4* assotred bug fixes *2.10.0.3* re #5707 - allow posted values to show on page; minor costmetics towards moving to a proper view *2.10.0.2* #5478 *2.10.0.1* incorrect path to system conversion script *2.10.0.0* new version changes *2.9.0.5* #5029 *2.9.0.4* #5000 *2.9.0.3* #4886 additional *2.9.0.2* #4886, #4907 *2.9.0.1* removed duplicate functions *2.9.0.0* #4562, #4326, #4557, #4632, #4651, #4653
